original_title: Slaughter: Live at the Hard Rock Cafe
overview: Slaughter thrashes out a blistering set list of hair-metal tracks in this career-spanning concert filmed at the Las Vegas Hard Rock Caf√© in 1997. Songs include "Fly to the Angels," "Up All Night (Sleep All Day)," "The Wild Life," "Days Gone By," "Hold On," "Old Man," "Shake This Place" and "Broken Hearts." Among the extras is a music video for "Shout It Out," released as part of the soundtrack for Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey.
title: Slaughter: Live at the Hard Rock Cafe
